body:
Does anybody actually remember me? the server is so different now, I don't like the lobby, but I love the monument counter and the people is better...or I'm rusty
Avicore still a thing?

title: It's been a long time [AMA]

replies.body: Hey! Thanks, I used to play a lot, like a year ago

replies.body:
Welcome back! I've seen you ingame recently, good to have you here :)

Which do you like better?
Soup or salad?
Sword or bow?
Apple or Microsoft?
Phone or tablet?
Mouse or trackpad?
Xbox 1 or PS4? (or Wii U...)
